entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and early afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast. High minus 8 except minus 4 along the coast. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 4 except near minus 8 inland.
